abstract.t: In the Resource Public Key Infrastructure (RPKI), resourcecertificates completely obscure names or any other information whichmight be useful for contacting responsible parties to deal withissues of certificate expiration, maintenance, roll-overs,compromises, etc. This draft describes the RPKI Ghostbusters Recordcontaining human contact information to be signed (indirectly) by aresource-owning certificate. The data in the record are those of aseverely profiled vCARD.
